results.name: The Starship Lemon Drop and the Quest to Crunch Numbers

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8/10/11 x86 or x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual Core E2220 (2 * 2400) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2 * 2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9500 GT (512 MB) or Radeon HD 6450 (512 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7,8,10
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM：256MB以上
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
